description: Default metrics emitted by Micrometer for GC, Memory, Threads, CPU usage, etc.

panels.description: Information regarding HTTP requests
panels.title: Http Server Requests

panels.description: Information regarding HTTP requests latency
panels.title: Http Server Requests Latency

panels.description: Information regarding HTTP requests latency
panels.title: Http Server Requests Max Latency

panels.description: Number of error level events that made it to the logs
panels.title: Logback

panels.description: Time spent in GC pause

targets.expr: sum by (cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{app="$app", action="end of minor GC"}[1m])) / sum by (cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{app="$app", action="end of minor GC"}[1m]))
sum by (cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{app="$app", action="end of minor GC"}[1m])) / sum by (cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{app="$app", action="end of minor GC"}[1m]))

panels.title: GC Pause: End of Minor GC - Avg

panels.description: Time spent in GC pause

targets.expr: avg by (cause) (jvm_gc_pause_seconds_max{app="$app", action="end of minor GC", instance=~"$instance"})
max by (cause) (jvm_gc_pause_seconds_max{app="$app", action="end of minor GC", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: GC Pause: End of Minor GC - Max

panels.description: #times minor gc was triggered / sec

targets.expr: sum by (cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{app="$app", action="end of minor GC", instance=~"$instance"}[1m]))

panels.title: End of minor GC Triggers / sec

panels.description: Time spent in GC pause

targets.expr: rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{app="$app", action="end of major GC"}[1m]) / rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{action="end of major GC"}[1m])
jvm_gc_pause_seconds_max{app="$app", action="end of major GC", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: GC Pause: End of Major GC

panels.description: #times major gc was triggered / sec

targets.expr: sum by (cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{app="$app", action="end of major GC", instance=~"$instance"}[1m]))

panels.title: Major GC Triggers / sec

panels.description: Size of long-lived heap memory pool after reclamation
panels.title: GC: Live Data Size

panels.description: Incremented for an increase in the size of the (young) heap memory pool after one GC to before the next
panels.title: GC: Allocated Memory / sec

panels.description: Count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before GC to after GC
panels.title: GC: Promoted Memory / sec

panels.description: Max size of long-lived heap memory pool
panels.title: GC: Max Size of long lived memory pool

panels.description: The amount of used memory
panels.title: Heap: Used Memory

panels.description: The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use
panels.title: Heap: Committed Memory

panels.description: The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management
panels.title: Heap: Max Memory

panels.description: The amount of used memory
panels.title: NonHeap: Used Memory

panels.description: The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for the Java virtual machine to use
panels.title: NonHeap: Committed Memory

panels.description: The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management
panels.title: NonHeap: Max Memory

panels.description: An estimate of the memory that the Java virtual machine is using for this buffer pool
panels.title: Buffer: Used Memory

panels.description: An estimate of the total capacity of the buffers in this pool
panels.title: Buffer: Total Capacity

panels.description: An estimate of the number of buffers in the pool
panels.title: Buffer: Count

panels.description: The current number of threads having NEW state
panels.title: Thread States

panels.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads
panels.title: Live Threads

panels.description: The current number of live daemon threads
panels.title: Daemon Threads

panels.description: The peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset
panels.title: Peak Threads

panels.description: The "recent cpu usage" for the Java Virtual Machine process
panels.title: Process CPU Usage

panels.description: The open file descriptor count
panels.title: Open files count

panels.description: The "recent cpu usage" for the whole system
panels.title: System CPU Usage

panels.description: The sum of the number of runnable entities queued to available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time
panels.title: System Load Average

panels.description: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Loaded classes / instance

panels.description: The number of classes unloaded / sec since the Java virtual machine has started execution
panels.title: Unloaded classes / sec

title: Micrometer Default Metrics
